Ground State Solver (fd_greens.main.ground_state_solver)

class GroundStateSolver(h: fd_greens.main.molecular_hamiltonian.MolecularHamiltonian, ansatz_func: Callable[[Sequence[float]], qiskit.circuit.quantumcircuit.QuantumCircuit] = <function build_ansatz_gs>, init_params: Sequence[float] = [1, 2, 3, 4], q_instance: Optional[qiskit.utils.quantum_instance.QuantumInstance] = None, method: str = 'exact', h5fname: str = 'lih')[source]

Bases: object

A class to solve the ground state energy and state.

run_exact() → None[source]

Calculates the exact ground state of the Hamiltonian using exact 2q gate decomposition.

run_vqe() → None[source]

Calculates the ground state of the Hamiltonian using VQE.

save_data() → None[source]

Saves ground state energy and ground state ansatz to hdf5 file.

run(method: Optional[str] = None) → None[source]

Runs the ground state calculation.
